text: The 2017 Colonial Athletic Association Baseball Tournament was held at Brooks Field in Wilmington, NC from May 24 through May 27, 2017. Fourth-seeded Delaware won the tournament and earned the Colonial Athletic Association's automatic bid to the 2017 NCAA Division I Baseball Tournament. ==Seeding and format== Continuing the format adopted in 2012, the top six finishers from the regular season competed in the double-elimination tournament, with the top two seeds earning first round byes. {|class=wikitable ! Elon lost the game, however, after Charleston scored the game's only run in the fifth inning without getting a hit. ==References== Tournament Category:Colonial Athletic Association Baseball Tournament CAA Baseball Tournament
title: 2017 Colonial Athletic Association Baseball Tournament
